author: rovere
body:
For a detailed list of changes with respect to the previous production version,
please refer to this link:
https://github.com/rovere/dqmgui/compare/8.2.2...8.2.4

Quick summary:
- Add Upload performance test
- Improve Overlay+Ratio Plots
- Fix annoying error message while drawing empty histograms ovelaid
- Fix annoying errors while performing KS tests on empty histograms
- Relax NaN rendering control limits
- Fix JSON rendering of NaN
title: DQMGUI Version 8.2.4
